text: Paris in Spring is a 1935 American romantic comedy movie directed by Lewis Milestone and was based on the play of the same name by Dwight Taylor. It stars Mary Ellis, Tullio Carminati, Ida Lupino, Lynne Overman, Jessie Ralph, Jack Raymond, Dorothea Wolbert, Billy Gilbert, Francis Ford and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * Paris in Spring at Allmovie * Paris in Spring at the Internet Movie Database Category:1935 romantic comedy movies Category:1930s American romance movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Lewis Milestone Category:Paramount Pictures movies
title: Paris in Spring
